title: Lead Software Engineer - Backend Software Engineer
summary: Originally brought in for my expertise on projects architecture, Ruby on Rails and to enforce good practices, I'm now the lead of a team dedicated to the public APIs and shipment tracking.

title: Innovation Team Leader - Software Engineer
summary: I worked on the food delivery platform when the company was named Lunchr. When it shifted to a neobank, I moved on the affiliates side and payment networks, of which I became a lead.

title: Lead Developer and Software Architect
summary: I built Graphiste.com (a designer job board) and Facture.net (an invoicing tool) from the ground up and implemented some major features and rewrites for their other websites.

title: Lead Developer
summary: I created from scratch the new version of their SaaS social network, aswell as the front facing website and internal tools used to boot and configure an instance and to monitor each of them.
